name: WP Admin Bar Hide MH
author: MH Arif

sections.description: WP Admin Bar Hide MH plugin hide the frontend admin bar in WordPress 3.1+, credits to Yoast, and Shelby Denike. If you want to use the WP Admin Bar Hide plugin and love it hungout with me, contact in softgudam.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp_admin_bar_hide_mh.php to the wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!, there are no settings for this.
